title: Crime Alert 03.22.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 03.22.19
description:
Mom accused of abusing adopted children to get them to perform on YouTube. Tot girl vanishes, kicking off the largest search in the state’s history. Now, mom has sixty days to track down father to serve him with a wrongful death suit. Vermont daycare owner allegedly gives a 6-month-old girl a lethal dose of Benadryl.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
